data.name: EpicsTooltip
data.value: Select a backlog and click Load to view epics and features. Items are grouped hierarchically and suggested states appear when parents differ from their children. Use Update to keep them in sync.

data.name: ReleaseNotesTooltip
data.value: Search and select user stories, then click Generate to build a prompt summarizing them for release notes. Use the copy button to copy the generated text.

data.name: ValidationTooltip
data.value: Select a backlog and states then click Check to validate work items against your configured rules. Any violations will be listed below.

data.name: StoryReviewTooltip
data.value: Select a backlog and states then click Generate to build a prompt for reviewing user stories.

data.name: MetricsTooltip
data.value: Choose a backlog and click Load to display weekly throughput, lead time and cycle time statistics. Charts visualize these metrics for the last twelve weeks.

data.name: RequirementPlannerTooltip
data.value: Select wiki pages or upload a requirements document to generate a prompt that breaks it into Epics, Features and User Stories. Paste the LLM response below to import items and create them in a backlog.

data.name: RemovePatWarning
data.value: This will delete the global PAT token. Continue?

data.name: RemoveOrgWarning
data.value: This will delete the global organization. Continue?

data.name: RemoveAllWarning
data.value: Signing out will remove all saved settings. Continue?

data.name: BranchHealthTooltip
data.value: Select a repository and click Load to view branch activity. Branches without recent commits are marked with a warning icon.

data.name: ChangeProjectWarning
data.value: Changing the project will clear the current page state. Continue?
